===Noun===
{{zh-noun}}

# rhizome of the [[galangal]]. (An [[herb]] used in [[traditional Chinese medicine]] as an antibiotic; to warm the stomach, and to improve digestion.)
# Alpinia galanga
# Zingiberaceae
